text:
Super Bowl 51: Atlanta Falcons v New England Patriots – in pictures Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email View more sharing options Share on LinkedIn Share on Pinterest Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp Share on Messenger Close 
Photo highlights from football’s biggest night
Sarah Gilbert 
Monday 6 February 2017 01.20 GMT Last modified on Monday 6 February 2017 01.44 GMT 

Fans arrive ahead of Super Bowl LI in Houston, Texas Photograph: Tom Pennington/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

There was heightened security for entry to the stadium Photograph: Mark Humphrey/Associated Press
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Half-time performer Lady Gaga relaxes on the field prior to the game Photograph: Kevin Mazur/WireImage
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Former US president George HW Bush and former first lady Barbara Bush are introduced for the coin toss Photograph: Gregory Shamus/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Mark Wahlberg, fan of the New England Patriots, speaks to player Danny Amendola Photograph: Al Bello/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Falcons fans 2 Chainz and Usher pose ahead of the game Photograph: Tom Pennington/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Atlanta Falcons owner Arthur Blank and New England Patriots owner Robert Kraft embrace before the Super Bowl Photograph: Matthew Emmons/USA Today Sports
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Singer Luke Bryan performs the national anthem Photograph: Tannen Maury/EPA
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

New England Patriots players huddle during the first half Photograph: Tim Donnelly/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Grady Jarrett of the Atlanta Falcons reacts after a sack in the first quarter against the New England Patriots Photograph: Patrick Smith/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Ryan Allen of the New England Patriots punts during the first quarter Photograph: Ezra Shaw/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Devonta Freeman of the Falcons scores a touchdown on a five yard run Photograph: Matthew Emmons/USA Today Sports
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Austin Hooper scores a second touchdown for the the Falcons Photograph: Ezra Shaw/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Tom Brady of the New England Patriots throws under pressure from the Atlanta Falcons in the second quarter Photograph: Tom Pennington/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Robert Alford celebrates a third touchdown for the Falcons Photograph: Kevin Jairaj/USA Today Sports
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Lady Gaga descends to perform during the half time interval Photograph: Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest
